data.name: Puddink
data.detailed_description:
Build a tower of pudding!

Puddink is a relaxing physics puzzle game in which your goal is to stack blocks of pudding to reach the flag. Carefully manage your limited blocks and build strongly. Don't let your pudding topple over!

Features:
  • hours of pudding building fun
  • simple one-click controls
  • a relaxing sound track

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
